function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of project impacts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g model without thorough impact assessment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate policy and law formulation in urban planning due to lack of consideration for digital fluency and digital rich environments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential limitations in using 5g and 6g technologies for telemedicine, teleworking, and real-time communication in health sector","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote working and xr technology may lead to decreased social interaction and community cohesion, increasing the risk of mental health issues and social isolation.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of xr technology and virtual environments could lead to decreased physical activity and an associated increase in sedentary behavior, leading to health issues.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of xr technology may lead to cybersecurity risks and potential exposure to virtual threats, impacting data privacy and security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased physical interactions in urban areas and cities due to the use of xr technology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared holographic displays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of infection due to crowded spaces around holographic displays","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through shared touch surfaces on holographic display interfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of high fidelity mobile holographic capability may lead to increased physical interaction and close proximity among individuals, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of ai and big data in creating super datasets for urban fabrics may lead to data privacy and security risks, potentially exposing sensitive information to unauthorized individuals or entities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased physical interaction in urban spaces and events.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6g and smart cities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remodelling and re-engineering of networks and systems across cities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving supportive infrastructures for 6g technology","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost implications and extensive upgrades for existing networks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards less face-to-face human interactions due to the outbreak of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shift to digital technology in architecture education","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization of design studios and classes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slowdown in technology advancements due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart wireless devices in urban areas","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged existence of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical reference to the spanish flu pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial subsidies may lead to an increase in the production and distribution of iot devices, potentially increasing the risk of disease transmission through contaminated devices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies such as 6g, iot, and immersive xr may lead to an expansion of cashless economies, potentially influencing the spread of contagious diseases through the handling of cashless payments.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The increased reliance on online schooling and work-at-home programs may result in prolonged close contact among individuals, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in these settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6g wireless technology due to different antenna and transceiver designs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6g technology and connectivity scope","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compatibility issues with 6g devices and sensors","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical and moral issues related to 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 infected persons","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on video conferencing technologies for communications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6g","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like ai, crowd computing, ar, and 5g","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital inequality in cities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with 6g wireless technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial limitations in technological infrastructure development for 6g implementation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
